item.title: OpenAI plans to release its next big AI model by December - The Verge
item.description:
1. OpenAI plans to release its next big AI model by December  The Verge
  2. OpenAI CEO responds to report of GPT-5 Orion coming later this year: ‘Fake news out of control’  VentureBeat
  3. Sam Altman calls reports the launch of OpenAI's next frontier model in December "fake news"  Windows Central
  4. OpenAI will reportedly unleash next-gen Orion AI model this December — Orion is expected to be 100X more potent than GPT-4  Tom's Hardware
  5. OpenAI says it won’t release a model called Orion this year  TechCrunch
